body_html: They shouldn't be able to apply I don't think, but they should be able to start filling out the application form (draft). I was thinking about the alert box to avoid any last minute surprises as @alicetragedy mentioned.
body_text: They shouldn't be able to apply I don't think, but they should be able to start filling out the application form (draft). I was thinking about the alert box to avoid any last minute surprises as @alicetragedy mentioned.
body: They shouldn't be able to _apply_ I don't think, but they should be able to start filling out the application form (draft). I was thinking about the alert box to avoid any last minute surprises as @alicetragedy mentioned.
